title: Anna Karenina. Parts 1 & 2
creator_credit: BBC Enterprises, Donald Wilson and Basil Coleman
brief_description: Anna Karenina after being married for ten years and moving in the highest aristocratic and political circles finds herself in a failing marriage. Believing herself to be vulnerable to temptation, she meets a man who is able to awaken a love that will prove tragic and fatal. Shot in Budapest, Hungary and England this BBC dramatisation brings to life Leo Tolstoy’s classic novel. Stars Nicola Pagett and Stuart Wilson.
